SELECT SUM(TOTAL_CNT)AS TOTAL_CNT FROM( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT A.APT_CODE) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM APT_INFO_MSTR A WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.APT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%')
GROUP BY A.APT_CODE )T

SELECT TBA.* FROM( SELECT TB.* , CAST(CEILING((RNUM)/#{PAGE_SIZE}) AS CHAR) AS PAGE , CAST(#{TOTAL_CNT} - RNUM +1 AS CHAR) AS RNUMUM FROM( SELECT T.* , @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS RNUM FROM( SELECT A.APT_NM , A.APT_CODE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_WARRANT_INFO WHERE A.APT_CODE = APT_CODE) AS HOSU_CNT FROM APT_INFO_MSTR A WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.APT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{SCH_WORD},'%')
ORDER BY A.APT_NM DESC LIMIT 9999999 )T,(SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) STR )TB )TBA
SELECT APT_CODE , APT_NM FROM APT_INFO_MSTR A WHERE A.APT_CODE NOT IN ( SELECT APT_CODE FROM TB_WARRANT_INFO )
SELECT * FROM APT_INFO_MSTR WHERE APT_CODE = #{SESSION_APT_CODE}

SELECT TRUNCATE((W_CNT * 100) / T_CNT , 2)AS TOTAL_AVG FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS W_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_WARRANT_INFO WHERE APT_CODE = #{SESSION_APT_CODE} )AS T_CNT FROM TB_WARRANT_INFO A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.WARRANT_YN = 'Y' AND A.APT_CODE = #{SESSION_APT_CODE} )T
SELECT DANZI FROM TB_WARRANT_INFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND APT_CODE = #{SESSION_APT_CODE} GROUP BY DANZI ORDER BY CONVERT(DANZI ,UNSIGNED) LIMIT 9999999

SELECT HP , USER_NM FROM( SELECT REPLACE(HP, '-', '')AS HP , USER_NM , '' AS MAIL FROM TB_WARRANT_INFO WHERE WARRANT_YN = 'Y' AND HP != '' AND APT_CODE = #{SESSION_APT_CODE} UNION ALL SELECT REPLACE(HP2, '-', '')AS HP , USER_NM2 , '' AS MAIL FROM TB_WARRANT_INFO WHERE WARRANT_YN = 'Y' AND HP2 != '' AND APT_CODE = #{SESSION_APT_CODE} )T WHERE LENGTH(HP) = 11 GROUP BY HP, USER_NM, MAIL ORDER BY USER_NM IS NULL ASC, USER_NM LIMIT 9999999

SELECT WARRANT_SEQ , APT_CODE , DANZI , DONG , HOSU , USER_NM , NICK , HP , HP2 , USER_NM2 , WARRANT_YN , CASE WHEN WARRANT_YN = 'Y' THEN '제출' ELSE '미제출' END AS WARRANT_YN_NM , AMT_YN , CASE WHEN AMT_YN = 'Y' THEN '납부' ELSE '미납부' END AS AMT_YN_NM , ADDR , JOHAP_YN , CASE WHEN JOHAP_YN = 'Y' THEN '조합' ELSE '일반분양자' END AS JOHAP_YN_NM , ETC , AMT , AMT_IN_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') REGDATE , DATE_FORMAT(UPDDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') UPDDATE FROM TB_WARRANT_INFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND APT_CODE = #{SESSION_APT_CODE} AND WARRANT_SEQ = #{WARRANT_SEQ} AND DONG = #{DONG} AND HOSU = #{HOSU}

SELECT WARRANT_SEQ , APT_CODE , DANZI , DONG , HOSU , USER_NM , NICK , HP , HP2 , USER_NM2 , WARRANT_YN , CASE WHEN WARRANT_YN = 'Y' THEN '제출' ELSE '미제출' END AS WARRANT_YN_NM , AMT_YN , CASE WHEN AMT_YN = 'Y' THEN '납부' ELSE '미납부' END AS AMT_YN_NM , ADDR , JOHAP_YN , CASE WHEN JOHAP_YN = 'Y' THEN '조합' ELSE '일반분양자' END AS JOHAP_YN_NM , ETC , AMT , AMT_IN_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') REGDATE , DATE_FORMAT(UPDDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') UPDDATE FROM TB_WARRANT_HIST WHERE 1 = 1 AND APT_CODE = #{SESSION_APT_CODE} AND WARRANT_SEQ = #{WARRANT_SEQ} AND DONG = #{DONG} AND HOSU = #{HOSU} ORDER BY UPDDATE LIMIT 9999999
SELECT SUM(IFNULL(CAST(AMT AS UNSIGNED), 0)) AS TOTAL_AMT FROM TB_AMT_INFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND APT_CODE = #{SESSION_APT_CODE}
SELECT APT_CODE , DONG , HOSU , USER_NM , AMT , AMT_IN_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') REGDATE , DATE_FORMAT(UPDDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') UPDDATE FROM TB_AMT_INFO WHERE AMT_SEQ = #{AMT_SEQ}
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(NOW_AMT), 0)AS NOW_AMT FROM SMS_SEND_INFO WHERE APT_CODE = #{SESSION_APT_CODE}
SELECT CEIL(#{TOTAL_CNT} / 1000) AS TC
SELECT APT_CODE , APT_NM FROM APT_INFO_MSTR ORDER BY APT_NM
SELECT DONG FROM TB_WARRANT_INFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND APT_CODE = #{SCH_APT_CODE} GROUP BY DONG ORDER BY CONVERT(DONG ,UNSIGNED) LIMIT 9999999
SELECT HOSU FROM TB_WARRANT_INFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND APT_CODE = #{SCH_APT_CODE} AND DONG = #{SCH_DONG} ORDER BY CONVERT(HOSU ,UNSIGNED) LIMIT 9999999
